value.string:
# This script search a trade condition matching to the order
 # and try to complete some fields
 order = context
 trade_condition_list = []
 
 trade_condition_portal_type = 'Purchase Trade Condition'
 trade_condition_list = order.getSpecialiseValueList(portal_type=(
 trade_condition_portal_type,))
 
 if len(trade_condition_list)==0:
 # Search a matching Trade Condition
 trade_condition_list = context.portal_domains.searchPredicateList(order,portal_type=('Purchase Trade Condition',),test=0)
 
 # Results
 if len(trade_condition_list ) == 0 :
 redirect_url = '%s/%s?%s' % ( context.absolute_url(), form_id
 , 'portal_status_message=No+Trade+Condition.')
 elif len(trade_condition_list ) > 1 :
 redirect_url = '%s/%s?%s' % ( context.absolute_url(), form_id
 , 'portal_status_message=Too+many+Trade+Condition.')
 else : 
 trade_condition=trade_condition_list[0].getObject()
 
 # Update Order Profile
 categories = order.getCategoryList()
 # Destination
 if order.getDestinationValue() == None and trade_condition.getDestinationValue() is not None :
 categories += ('destination/'+trade_condition.getDestinationRelativeUrl(),)
 # destination_decision
 if (order.getDestinationDecisionValue() is None) and \
 (trade_condition.getDestinationDecisionValue() is not None) :
 categories += ('destination_decision/'+trade_condition.getDestinationDecisionRelativeUrl(),)
 # destination_administration
 if (order.getDestinationAdministrationValue() is None) and \
 (trade_condition.getDestinationAdministrationValue() is not None) :
 categories += ('destination_administration/'+trade_condition.getDestinationAdministrationRelativeUrl(),)
 # destination_payment
 if (order.getDestinationPaymentValue() is None) and \
 (trade_condition.getDestinationPaymentValue() is not None) :
 categories += ('destination_payment/'+trade_condition.getDestinationPaymentRelativeUrl(),)
 
 # SOURCE_section
 if order.getSourceSectionValue() is None :
 # if source_section is not defined on TradeCondition, use Order source
 if trade_condition.getSourceSectionValue() is not None :
 categories += ('source_section/'+trade_condition.getSourceSectionRelativeUrl(),)
 elif trade_condition.getSourceValue() is not None:
 categories += ('source_section/'+order.getSourceRelativeUrl(),)
 # else :
 # categories += ('source_section/'+order.getSourceRelativeUrl(),)
 # source_decision
 if order.getSourceDecisionValue(portal_type='Organisation') is None :
 # if source_decision is not defined on TradeCondition, use Order source
 if trade_condition.getSourceDecisionValue(portal_type='Organisation')\
 is not None :
 categories += ('source_decision/'+trade_condition.getSourceDecisionValue(portal_type='Organisation').getRelativeUrl(),)
 # else :
 # categories += ('source_decision/'+order.getSourceValue().getRelativeUrl(),)
 elif order.getSourceValue() is not None:
 categories += ('source_decision/'+order.getSourceRelativeUrl(),)
 # source_administration
 if order.getSourceAdministrationValue() is None :
 # if source_administration is not defined on TradeCondition, use Order source
 if trade_condition.getSourceAdministrationValue() is not None :
 categories += ('source_administration/'+trade_condition.getSourceAdministrationValue().getRelativeUrl(),)
 # else :
 # categories += ('source_administration/'+order.getSourceRelativeUrl(),)
 elif order.getSourceValue() is not None:
 categories += ('source_administration/'+order.getSourceRelativeUrl(),)
 # source_payment
 if order.getSourcePaymentValue() is None :
 # if source_payment is not defined on TradeCondition, use Order source
 if trade_condition.getSourcePaymentValue() is not None :
 categories += ('source_payment/'+trade_condition.getSourcePaymentRelativeUrl(),)
 # else :
 elif order.getSourceValue() is not None:
 categories += ('source_payment/'+order.getSourceRelativeUrl(),)
 
 # Copy of devise
 if (order.getResourceValue() is None) and \
 (trade_condition.getResourceValue() is not None) :
 categories += ('resource/'+trade_condition.getResourceRelativeUrl(),)
 
 # Update Order Payment
 # payment_term=''
 # if order.hasPaymentTerm() :
 # payment_term = order.getPaymentTerm()
 # elif trade_condition.hasPaymentTerm() :
 # payment_term = trade_condition.getPaymentTerm()
 # 
 # payment_end_of_month=''
 # if order.hasPaymentEndOfMonth() :
 # payment_end_of_month = order.getPaymentEndOfMonth()
 # elif trade_condition.hasPaymentTerm() :
 # payment_end_of_month = trade_condition.getPaymentEndOfMonth()
 # 
 # payment_additional_term=''
 # if order.hasPaymentAdditionalTerm() :
 # payment_additional_term = order.getPaymentAdditionalTerm()
 # elif trade_condition.hasPaymentAdditionalTerm() :
 # payment_additional_term = trade_condition.getPaymentAdditionalTerm()
 # 
 # if (order.getPaymentModeValue() is None) and \
 # (trade_condition.getPaymentModeValue() is not None) :
 # categories += (trade_condition.getPaymentModeValue().getRelativeUrl(),)
 # 
 # if (order.getTradeDateValue() is None) and \
 # (trade_condition.getTradeDateValue() is not None) :
 # categories += (trade_condition.getTradeDateValue().getRelativeUrl(),)
 
 # Copy Incoterm
 if (order.getIncotermValue() is None) and \
 (trade_condition.getIncotermValue() is not None) :
 categories += (trade_condition.getIncotermValue().getRelativeUrl(),)
 
 if (order.getDeliveryModeValue() is None) and \
 (trade_condition.getDeliveryModeValue() is not None) :
 categories += (trade_condition.getDeliveryModeValue().getRelativeUrl(),)
 
 destination_decision_source_reference = ''
 if order.hasDestinationDecisionSourceReference() :
 destination_decision_source_reference = order.getDestinationDecisionSourceReference()
 elif trade_condition.hasDestinationDecisionSourceReference() :
 destination_decision_source_reference = trade_condition.getDestinationDecisionSourceReference()
 
 # copy PaymentCondition if no one is defined on Order
 payment_condition_portal_type = 'Payment Condition'
 if len(order.contentIds(filter={'portal_type':payment_condition_portal_type})) == 0 :
 to_copy=[]
 to_copy=trade_condition.contentIds(filter={'portal_type':payment_condition_portal_type})
 if len(to_copy)>0 :
 copy_data = trade_condition.manage_copyObjects(ids=to_copy)
 new_id_list = order.manage_pasteObjects(copy_data)
 
 # copy Discount if no one is defined on Order
 discount_portal_type = 'Discount'
 if len(order.contentIds(filter={'portal_type':discount_portal_type})) == 0 :
 to_copy=[]
 to_copy=trade_condition.contentIds(filter={'portal_type':discount_portal_type})
 if len(to_copy)>0 :
 copy_data = trade_condition.manage_copyObjects(ids=to_copy)
 new_id_list = order.manage_pasteObjects(copy_data)
 
 # Update specialise value of Order
 final_categories = ()
 for category_item in categories :
 if category_item.find('specialise/') == (-1):
 final_categories += (category_item,)
 
 final_categories += ('specialise/'+trade_condition.getRelativeUrl(),)
 
 order.edit(categories=final_categories, # payment_term=payment_term,
 # payment_end_of_month=payment_end_of_month,
 # payment_additional_term=payment_additional_term,
 destination_decision_source_reference = destination_decision_source_reference)
 
 redirect_url = '%s/%s?%s' % (context.absolute_url(), form_id,
 'portal_status_message=Order+updated.')
 
 if batch_mode:
 return None
 else:
 context.REQUEST[ 'RESPONSE' ].redirect( redirect_url )
